# focusedItem

**Instance Property**

The item that’s currently focused.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var focusedItem: (any UIFocusItem)? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the current object or none of its children are focused, this property is set to `nil`.
title: focusedItem
